backend/main.mo: Defines core backend types for policies, users, products, orders, educational content, and startup program data, including comparison logic and storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking a light‑theme requirement to specific frontend files, components, and test coverage.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and functionality of all major frontend components and pages.
frontend/index.html: HTML document bootstrapping the React app with metadata, PWA tags, and asset links.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest defining app metadata, icons, colors, and screenshots for installation.
Markdown privacy policy detailing data collection, usage, rights, and contact information.
Markdown returns policy explaining eligibility, process, refunds, and non-returnable items.
frontend/public/policies/shipping-policy: Markdown shipping policy describing methods, costs, processing times, and delivery conditions.
frontend/public/policies/terms-and-condi: Markdown document outlining ANC platform terms including user responsibilities, marketplace rules, payments, liability, dispute resolution, and modification rights.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring TanStack Router routes, React Query client, theme provider, and global error boundaries.
frontend/src/components/admin/assistant/: Manages assistant knowledge base entries, including search, add, edit, and category-based flagging.
Displays unanswered questions and allows converting them into knowledge base entries with category assignment.
frontend/src/components/admin/Marketplac: Displays admin marketplace roadmap data with progress, refresh capability, and error/permission handling.
frontend/src/components/admin/UserRoleMa: Shows user role summary counts with error handling and loading states for admin role management.
frontend/src/components/assistant/Assist: Provides full chat UI for the assistant with messaging, mode selection, speech recognition, TTS, and voice activation.
Floating widget that toggles and displays the assistant chat panel.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component showing legal links, contact details, accepted payments, and partners.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Layout wrapper providing header navigation, login/logout logic, banner, assistant widget, and global page structure.
frontend/src/components/policies/PolicyD: Fetches and renders markdown-based policy content, showing loading, error, and signature status cues.
frontend/src/components/policies/PolicyS: Displays all policies with UI to accept and sign them, managing signature state and backend submission.
frontend/src/components/policies/Require: Blocks access to children until all required policies are signed, showing a prompt with unsigned items.
frontend/src/components/privacy/CookieCo: Shows a cookie consent banner until the user accepts or rejects, storing the preference in local storage.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Profile setup form allowing users to submit name and email and save their profile via a backend mutation.
frontend/src/components/RouterErrorScree: Fallback UI for route-level errors with message and link back to home.
frontend/src/components/RuntimeErrorBoun: Error boundary that catches runtime errors and displays a refresh prompt with optional error details.
frontend/src/components/security/HumanCh: Modal dialog requiring a checkbox and simple math challenge to verify a human before proceeding.
frontend/src/components/startup/Activiti: Empty placeholder file for startup activities UI.
frontend/src/components/startup/Business: Empty placeholder file for business credit UI.
frontend/src/components/startup/ClassesL: Empty placeholder file for classes/lessons UI.
frontend/src/components/startup/LessonDe: Displays a lesson’s details, embedded video, HTML content, and completion/back controls.
frontend/src/components/startup/VirtualM: Empty placeholder file for virtual meetings UI.
frontend/src/contexts/VoiceSettingsConte: Provides microphone permission state and voice preference controls through a React context.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAssistant.ts: Provides a mutation hook to ask the backend assistant a question via the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hook for managing Internet Identity login state using AuthClient, including loading, login, logout, and status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useMicrophonePermissi: Manages microphone permission status, checks browser support, and provides functions to request or retry permission.
frontend/src/hooks/usePageActivity.ts: Tracks whether the page is currently active based on visibility and focus events.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for interacting with backend actor methods for roles, dashboard data, partners, and policies.
Wraps browser speech recognition with state management, transcript handling, error reporting, and optional auto-restart.
frontend/src/hooks/useTextToSpeech.ts: Manages text-to-speech playback, tracking speaking state and controlling speech start, stop, and cancel.
frontend/src/hooks/useVoicePreferences.t: Loads and updates voice-related user preferences stored in localStorage.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining color themes, dark mode variables, and custom animations for UI elements.
frontend/src/lib/cookieConsent.ts: Handles reading, writing, and checking stored cookie consent status in localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/humanCheck.ts: Implements session-based human verification tracking with a TTL and helpers to set, clear, and evaluate status.
frontend/src/lib/policies.ts: Defines policy metadata and exports structured identifiers and a list of all policy definitions.
frontend/src/lib/pricingCopy.ts: Defines centralized pricing model text and Store Builder pricing data used across the app.
frontend/src/lib/voice/browserVoice.ts: Provides Web Speech API feature checks and factories for speech recognition and speech synthesis controllers.
Manages localStorage-backed user voice preferences with versioning and update helpers.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Empty placeholder page for the admin dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/AffiliateDashboardPag: Empty placeholder page for the affiliate dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/AppCenterPage.tsx: Empty placeholder page for the app center.
frontend/src/pages/AppLaunchPage.tsx: Empty placeholder page for app launch functionality.
frontend/src/pages/AppointmentDashboard5: Empty placeholder page for the appointment dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/B2BDashboard.tsx: Empty placeholder page for the B2B dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/CustomerBlog.tsx: Renders a customer blog overview with a grid of blog post cards and navigation to individual posts.
frontend/src/pages/CustomerBlogPost.tsx: Displays full content for a selected customer blog post using route params.
frontend/src/pages/CustomerFAQ.tsx: Shows an FAQ list for customers, including pricing answers sourced from PRICING_MODEL.
frontend/src/pages/CustomerFavoritesPage: Empty placeholder page for customer favorites.
Displays a login-gated messages page with a placeholder inbox for future messaging features.
frontend/src/pages/CustomerProfileHome.t: Empty placeholder page for the customer profile home.
frontend/src/pages/CustomerPurchaseHisto: Displays a login-gated purchase history page with a placeholder for future order tracking.
Renders the customer settings UI with identity checks, voice permissions, and policy signatures management.
Empty page placeholder for customer wishlist functionality.
frontend/src/pages/FunnelsPage.tsx: Empty page placeholder for sales funnel features.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Displays the homepage with hero content and feature cards linking to service sections.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailure.tsx: Empty page placeholder for payment failure messaging.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccess.tsx: Empty page placeholder for payment success confirmation.
frontend/src/pages/PciCompliancePage.tsx: Shows PCI compliance certificate details with viewing and download options.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPolicyPage.tsx: Loads and displays the privacy policy using a shared policy component.
frontend/src/pages/ReturnsPolicyPage.tsx: Loads and displays the returns policy using a shared policy component.
frontend/src/pages/SellersBusinessesBlog: Lists business-related blog posts with categories, excerpts, and navigation links.
Displays full blog post content based on the dynamic postId parameter.
Renders a FAQ page for B2B and startup services using accordions and cards with predefined questions and answers.
frontend/src/pages/ShippingPolicyPage.ts: Displays the shipping policy by loading a markdown document through the PolicyDocument component.
frontend/src/pages/StartupDashboard.tsx: Empty page placeholder for a startup dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/StoreBuilderPage.tsx: Empty page placeholder for the Store Builder feature.
frontend/src/pages/StorePage.tsx: Empty page placeholder for the Store page.
frontend/src/pages/TermsConditionsPage.t: Displays the terms and conditions by loading a markdown document through the PolicyDocument component.
frontend/src/types/index.ts: Defines TypeScript interfaces and enums for users, products, orders, educational content, services, integrations, and store builder configurations.
frontend/src/types/speech.d.ts: Provides TypeScript definitions for the Web Speech API, including SpeechRecognition and related events.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS with custom colors, animations, container settings, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing site background issues, feature requests, and current project state.
